SELECT
FROM bill b LEFT JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.id WHERE b.deleted = 0 AND c.deleted = 0 AND b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.id = #{billId} LIMIT 1

SELECT b.category_id, c.name AS category_name, c.icon AS category_icon, SUM(b.amount) AS total_amount, COUNT(*) AS bill_count FROM bill b LEFT JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.id WHERE b.deleted = 0 AND c.deleted = 0 AND b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.type = #{type} AND b.bill_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY b.category_id, c.name, c.icon ORDER BY total_amount DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(bill_date, '%Y-%m') AS period, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN type = 1 THEN amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS income, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN type = 2 THEN amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS expense, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN type = 1 THEN amount ELSE -amount END), 0) AS balance FROM bill WHERE deleted = 0 AND user_id = #{userId} AND bill_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(bill_date, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY period
